trans-unit.source: Represents a column of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 열을 나타냅니다 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewComboBoxColumn class is a specialized type of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> used to logically host cells that enable users to select values from a list of choices.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewComboBoxColumn 클래스는 특수 한 유형의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>호스트 셀을 논리적 사용자가 선택 목록에서 값을 선택할 수 있도록 하는 데 사용 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: A DataGridViewComboBoxColumn has an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> in every <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> that intersects it.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewComboBoxColumn에는 연결 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>모든 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>과 교차 하는 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>

trans-unit.source: You can populate the cells manually by setting their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하 여 셀을 수동으로 채울 자신의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can bind the column to the data source indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 또한 가리키는 데이터 원본에 열에 바인딩할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is bound to a database table, set the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A> property to the name of a column in the table.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>데이터베이스 테이블에 바인딩된, 열을 설정 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A>속성을 테이블에 있는 열의 이름입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is bound to a collection of objects, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A> property to the name of an object property.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>은 개체의 컬렉션에 바인딩된, 설정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A>속성을 개체 속성의 이름입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: You can populate the column drop-down list manually by adding values to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 값을 추가 하 여 수동으로 열 드롭 다운 목록을 채울 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.Items%2A>컬렉션.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can bind the drop-down list to its own data source by setting the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 열을 설정 하 여 데이터 원본에 드롭 다운 목록을 바인딩할 수는 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the values are objects in a collection or records in a database table, you must also set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션의 개체 또는 데이터베이스 테이블의 레코드 값인 경우 설정 해야는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> property indicates which object property or database column provides the values that are displayed in the drop-down list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>속성 드롭다운 목록에 표시 되는 값을 제공 하는 개체 속성 또는 데이터베이스 열을 나타냅니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> property indicates which object property or database column is used to set the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>속성은 셀을 설정 하려면 사용 되는 개체 속성 또는 데이터베이스 열을 나타냅니다 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: One typical scenario is to bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control to a parent database table and bind the drop-down list to a related child table.
trans-unit.target: 바인딩하는 한 가지 일반적인 시나리오는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>부모 데이터베이스 테이블을 제어 하 고 드롭 다운 목록 관련된 자식 테이블에 바인딩합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control to an `Orders` table that contains a `ProductID` column and set the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A> property to a `Products` table that contains `ProductID` and `ProductName` columns.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어에 바인딩할 수도 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>컨트롤을 `Orders` 포함 된 테이블을 `ProductID` 열 및 열 집합 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>속성을는 `Products` 포함 된 테이블 `ProductID` 및 `ProductName` 열.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: In this case, you would set the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A> property to "ProductID" to populate its cell values from the `Orders.ProductID` column.
trans-unit.target: 이 경우에 열 설정한 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A>속성을 "ProductID"는에서 셀 값을 채우는 `Orders.ProductID` 열.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, to display the actual product names in the cells and the drop-down list, you would map these values to the `Products` table by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> property to "ProductID" and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> property to "ProductName".
trans-unit.target: 그러나 실제 제품 이름을 셀 및 드롭 다운 목록에 표시를 하는 매핑할 이러한 값을는 `Products` 설정 하 여 테이블의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>속성을 "ProductID" 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>속성을 "ProductName".</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: The drop-down list values (or the values indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> property) must include the actual cell values or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 드롭다운 목록에서 값 (또는 값으로 표시는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>속성) 실제 셀 값을 포함 해야 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>컨트롤 예외가 throw 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> properties automatically sets the corresponding properties of all cells in the column including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 열 설정 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>속성 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> 를 포함 하 여 열에 있는 모든 셀의 해당 속성을 자동으로 설정</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> 하 고</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override these property values for specific cells, set the column property first, and then set the cell properties.
trans-unit.target: 특정 셀에 대 한 이러한 속성 값을 재정의 하려면 먼저 열 속성을 설정 하 고 셀 속성을 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> does not have <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 와 달리는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>컨트롤은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>없는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: Instead, selecting a value from a drop-down list sets the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 드롭다운 목록에서 값을 선택 하는 셀을 설정 하는 대신, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default sort mode for this column type is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.
trans-unit.target: 이 열 형식에 대 한 기본 정렬 모드는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn"></xref> class to the default state.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn"> </xref> 클래스를 기본 상태로 초기화 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When initializing a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn> instance, this constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> instance.
trans-unit.target: 새 초기화할 때 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn>인스턴스를이 생성자는 설정의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>속성을 새 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>인스턴스.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether cells in the column will match the characters being entered in the cell with one from the possible selections.
trans-unit.target: 열의 셀은 선택 가능한 항목에서 하나가 지정 된 셀에 입력 되는 문자를 일치 하는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.AutoComplete%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하거나 가져옵니다 가져오거나이 속성을 설정 하는 데는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.AutoComplete%2A>반환 되는 개체의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.AutoComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.AutoComplete%2A> property of every cell in the column.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정 집합에서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.AutoComplete%2A>열의 모든 셀의 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.AutoComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 개별 셀에 대해 지정된 된 값을 재정의 하려면 열 값을 설정 하면 셀 값을 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if auto completion is activated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>자동 완성 기능 활성화 되어 있습니다. 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to create cells.
trans-unit.target: 셀을 만드는 데 사용 되는 템플릿을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The constructor for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn> class initializes this property to a newly created <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn>클래스에서이 속성에 새로 만든된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> 을 초기화</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn> 하는 것에 대 한 생성자

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 셀 서식 파일의 속성 변경 즉시 영향을 주지 것입니다 열의 기존 셀의 사용자 인터페이스 (UI).

trans-unit.source: These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method).
trans-unit.target: 열 다시 생성 한 후 이러한 변경 된 것만 (예를 들어 열 정렬 이나 호출을 통해는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>메서드).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that all other cells in the column are modeled after.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> 있는 다른 열의 모든 셀에는 다음에 모델링 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value is a new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 새 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: When setting this property to a value that is not of type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 값으로이 속성을 설정 없는 경우 형식의 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this column.
trans-unit.target: 이 칼럼의 정확한 복사본을 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to duplicate a column of cells.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 사용 하 여 셀의 열을 복제 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>복제 된 나타내는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source that populates the selections for the combo boxes.
trans-unit.target: 콤보 상자의 선택 항목을 채우는 데이터 소스를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The DataSource or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.Items%2A> properties specify where to retrieve the selection data shown in the combo box drop-down list.
trans-unit.target: 데이터 원본 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.Items%2A>속성 콤보 상자 드롭다운 목록에 표시 된 선택 영역 데이터를 검색 하는 위치를 지정 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: When using the DataSource property, if the data must be drawn from a nondefault property or column, then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> property must be set to the name of the nondefault property or column.
trans-unit.target: 기본이 아닌 속성이 나 열에서 데이터를 그려야 할 DataSource 속성을 사용 하는 경우 다음의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>열 또는 기본이 아닌 속성의 이름으로 속성을 설정 해야 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the DataSource property is set to a string array, then <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> do not need to be set because each string in the array will be used for both value and display.
trans-unit.target: DataSource 속성이 문자열 배열에 다음 설정 되어 있는지 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>배열의 각 문자열 값과 표시에 사용 되므로 설정할 필요가 없습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DataSource%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하거나 가져옵니다 가져오거나이 속성을 설정 하는 데는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DataSource%2A>반환 되는 개체의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DataSource%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정 집합에서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DataSource%2A>속성 새로 고침 및 열에 있는 모든 셀의 열을 표시 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 개별 셀에 대해 지정된 된 값을 재정의 하려면 열 값을 설정 하면 셀 값을 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents a data source.
trans-unit.target: 데이터 소스를 나타내는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that specifies the property or column from which to retrieve strings for display in the combo boxes.
trans-unit.target: 콤보 상자에 표시할 문자열을 검색할 열 또는 속성을 지정 하는 문자열을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The data for the values stored in a column of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> objects is obtained from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 에서 가져온 개체의</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> 열에 저장 된 값에 대 한 데이터

trans-unit.source: If this data comes from a nondefault property or column, then the DisplayMember property must be set to the necessary property name or column name.
trans-unit.target: 기본이 아닌 속성이 나 열에서이 데이터 상태가 되 면 DisplayMember 속성 필요한 속성 이름 또는 열 이름으로 설정 되어야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the cell values are internal values not visible to the user, then use DisplayMember and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> to map the internal cell values to user-viewable values.
trans-unit.target: 셀 값은 사용자에 게 표시 되지 않는 내부 값을 사용 하 여 DisplayMember 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>내부 셀 값은 사용자가 볼 수 있는 값에 매핑됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A> property is set to a string array, the DisplayMember property does not need to be set because each string in the array will be used as a valid display string and as a valid underlying value.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>속성이 문자열 배열에 설정 되어 있으면 DisplayMember 속성이 올바른 표시 문자열이 및 올바른 내부 값으로 배열의 각 문자열은 사용 하기 때문에 설정할 필요는 없습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayMember%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하거나 가져옵니다 가져오거나이 속성을 설정 하는 데는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayMember%2A>반환 되는 개체의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayMember%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정 집합에서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayMember%2A>속성 새로 고침 및 열에 있는 모든 셀의 열을 표시 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 개별 셀에 대해 지정된 된 값을 재정의 하려면 열 값을 설정 하면 셀 값을 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that specifies the name of a property or column in the data source specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource*> property.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>에 지정 된 데이터 원본에 대 한 열 또는 속성의 이름을 지정 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource*>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines how the combo box is displayed when not editing.
trans-unit.target: 콤보 상자의 편집 하지 않을 때 표시 되는 방식을 결정 하는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The DisplayStyle property affects the appearance of cells in the column when they are not in edit mode, and regardless of whether they are read-only.
trans-unit.target: DisplayStyle 속성 열에 있는 셀의 모양을 편집 모드에 있지 및 읽기 전용인 지 여부에 관계 없이 서로 영향을 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: When a cell is in edit mode, it always looks like a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 셀 편집 모드일 때 항상 모양는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A> property value is `false`, the DisplayStyle property affects all cells in the column; otherwise, the DisplayStyle property affects only the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A>속성 값은 `false`, DisplayStyle 속성 열에 있는 모든 셀에 영향을 줍니다 않으며 DisplayStyle 속성 현재 셀에만 적용 하는 그렇지 않은 경우.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: The behavior and appearance of the drop-down arrow in the cells is indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.FlatStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 동작 및 셀에 있는 드롭다운 화살표의 모양으로 표시 됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.FlatStyle%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To enable cell highlighting when the mouse pointer is over a cell, you must set the DisplayStyle property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.FlatStyle%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.FlatStyle%2A>속성을 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.FlatStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle> DisplayStyle 속성 설정 해야 하는 마우스 포인터가 셀 위에 있을 때 셀을 강조 표시를 사용 하려면

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyle%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하거나 가져옵니다 가져오거나이 속성을 설정 하는 데는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyle%2A>반환 되는 개체의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyle%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정 집합에서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyle%2A>속성 새로 고침 및 열에 있는 모든 셀의 열을 표시 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 개별 셀에 대해 지정된 된 값을 재정의 하려면 열 값을 설정 하면 셀 값을 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle"></xref> value indicating the combo box appearance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle"> </xref> 콤보 상자 모양을 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle*> property value applies only to the current cell in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control when the current cell is in this column.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 여부는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle*>속성 값에서 현재 셀에만 적용 됩니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> 현재 셀이이 열에 있을 때이 컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle*>

trans-unit.source: If the DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly property value is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A> property affects all cells in the column; otherwise, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A> property affects only the current cell.
trans-unit.target: DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly 속성 값이 `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A>속성에는 열에 모든 셀에 적용 되며 그렇지 않은 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A>속성 현재 셀에만 영향을 줍니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A> property affects the appearance of cells in the column when they are not in edit mode, and regardless of whether they are read-only.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A>속성 편집 모드에 있지 및 읽기 전용인 지 여부에 관계 없이 있을 때 열에서 셀의 모양에 영향을 줍니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a cell is in edit mode, it always looks like a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 셀 편집 모드일 때 항상 모양는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하거나 가져옵니다 가져오거나이 속성을 설정 하는 데는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A>반환 되는 개체의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정 집합에서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A>속성 새로 고침 및 열에 있는 모든 셀의 열을 표시 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 개별 셀에 대해 지정된 된 값을 재정의 하려면 열 값을 설정 하면 셀 값을 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the display style applies only to the current cell; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>표시 스타일이 고, 현재 셀에만 적용 되는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the drop-down lists of the combo boxes.
trans-unit.target: 상자는 콤보 드롭 다운 목록의 너비를 설정 하거나 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> member.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성에 해당 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A?displayProperty=fullName>의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>멤버.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하거나 가져옵니다 가져오거나이 속성을 설정 하는 데는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A>반환 되는 개체의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A> property of every cell in the column.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정 집합에서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A>열의 모든 셀의 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 개별 셀에 대해 지정된 된 값을 재정의 하려면 열 값을 설정 하면 셀 값을 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the drop-down lists.
trans-unit.target: 드롭다운 목록의 픽셀 너비입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 1입니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the flat style appearance of the column's cells.
trans-unit.target: 열의 셀의 평면 스타일 모양을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The FlatStyle property affects the behavior and appearance of the drop-down arrows for the cells in this column.
trans-unit.target: FlatStyle 속성 동작과이 열의 셀에에서 대 한 드롭다운 화살표의 모양에 영향을 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_2015](~/add/includes/net-2015-md.md)], when the FlatStyle property is set to `Flat` or `Popup` the drop-down arrows are resized according to the system DPI settings when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ``` To enable cell highlighting when the mouse pointer is over a cell, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle> and the FlatStyle property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 부터는 [!INCLUDE[net_2015](~/add/includes/net-2015-md.md)]FlatStyle 속성이로 설정 된 경우, `Flat` 또는 `Popup` app.config 파일에 다음 항목이 포함 되어 있으면 시스템 DPI 설정에 따라 드롭 다운 화살표 크기가 조정 됩니다: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ``` 마우스 포인터가 셀 위에 있을 때 셀을 강조 표시를 사용 하도록 설정 하려면 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A>속성 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle> FlatStyle 속성을</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A> 설정 해야

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하거나 가져옵니다 가져오거나이 속성을 설정 하는 데는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A>반환 되는 개체의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정 집합에서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A>속성 새로 고침 및 열에 있는 모든 셀의 열을 표시 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 개별 셀에 대해 지정된 된 값을 재정의 하려면 열 값을 설정 하면 셀 값을 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref> value indicating the cell appearance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref> 셀 모양을 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of objects used as selections in the combo boxes.
trans-unit.target: 콤보 상자의 선택 항목으로 사용 되는 개체의 컬렉션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This property returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성의 값을 반환는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Items%2A>의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>에서 반환 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Items or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> properties are used to populate the selections of the combo boxes.
trans-unit.target: 항목 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>속성 콤보 상자의 선택 항목을 채우는 데 사용 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: If strings are added to Items, then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> properties do not need to be set because each string added will be used for both value and display.
trans-unit.target: 문자열이 항목에 추가 되 면 하면 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>속성 값과 표시에 추가 된 각 문자열이 사용 되므로 설정할 필요가 없습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn> does not support the use of multiple items with identical display values.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn>동일 하 게 표시 값을 가진 여러 항목의 사용을 지원 하지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A> property is set, then Items cannot be used.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>속성이 설정 되어 다음 항목을 사용할 수 없습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ObjectCollection> that represents the selections in the combo boxes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ObjectCollection>콤보 상자의 선택 항목을 나타내는입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ObjectCollection>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of items in the drop-down list of the cells in the column.
trans-unit.target: 열에 있는 셀의 드롭다운 목록에서 항목의 최대 수를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.MaxDropDownItems%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하거나 가져옵니다 가져오거나이 속성을 설정 하는 데는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.MaxDropDownItems%2A>반환 되는 개체의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.MaxDropDownItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.MaxDropDownItems%2A> property of every cell in the column.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정 집합에서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.MaxDropDownItems%2A>열의 모든 셀의 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.MaxDropDownItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 개별 셀에 대해 지정된 된 값을 재정의 하려면 열 값을 설정 하면 셀 값을 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of drop-down list items, from 1 to 100.
trans-unit.target: 1 ~ 100의 드롭다운 목록에서 항목의 최대 수입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is 8.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 8입니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the items in the combo box are sorted.
trans-unit.target: 콤보 상자의 항목이 정렬 되는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Sorted%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하거나 가져옵니다 가져오거나이 속성을 설정 하는 데는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Sorted%2A>반환 되는 개체의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Sorted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Sorted%2A> property of every cell in the column.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정 집합에서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Sorted%2A>열의 모든 셀의 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Sorted%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 개별 셀에 대해 지정된 된 값을 재정의 하려면 열 값을 설정 하면 셀 값을 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the combo box is sorted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>콤보 상자가 정렬 되어 있는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: 열을 설명 하는 문자열을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>열을 설명 하는.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that specifies the property or column from which to get values that correspond to the selections in the drop-down list.
trans-unit.target: 드롭다운 목록에서 선택한 항목에 해당 하는 값을 가져올 대상 열 또는 속성을 지정 하는 문자열을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> for more information about its relationship with ValueMember.
trans-unit.target: 참조 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>ValueMember와의 관계에 대 한 자세한 내용은.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A> property is set to a string array, the ValueMember property does not need to be set because each string in the array will be used as a valid display string and as a valid underlying value.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>속성이 문자열 배열에 설정 되어 있으면 ValueMember 속성이 올바른 표시 문자열이 및 올바른 내부 값으로 배열의 각 문자열은 사용 하기 때문에 설정할 필요는 없습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ValueMember%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하거나 가져옵니다 가져오거나이 속성을 설정 하는 데는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ValueMember%2A>반환 되는 개체의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ValueMember%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정 집합에서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ValueMember%2A>속성 새로 고침 및 열에 있는 모든 셀의 열을 표시 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 개별 셀에 대해 지정된 된 값을 재정의 하려면 열 값을 설정 하면 셀 값을 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that specifies the name of a property or column used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource*> property.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>에 사용 되는 열 또는 속성의 이름을 지정 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource*>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>
